aa yako...mu hithan inne udalu mitak yathu ganawa kiyalada manda....nikan hiri watila wage..mama chuttak path wela baluwa galawila bimata watilada kiyala...na thiyanawa....mu pisse wali kadadasiyakinda manda...doka aawa...glawus dekak da gaththa...mokakdo tiyub ekakin krim ekak aran piti alla da gaththa...atendant karaya selayin batayak wage mokakdo ekak dunna aga pakat ekak ellala thiyana...le dendawath yanawada?wenda ba...budu ammo...eka paratama mulu angama hiri watila giya..ange mayil mawa dala yanda tharam wegen issuna...mokakda ee une ..mata danune mokakdo ekak ahawal eka dige athulata bahinawa witharayi...le bindu deka thunak selayin baten pallehata watuna...ane deyiyane mageth ara mokakda patalayak thibila...mokakda bola hipatuwo me kare....araki passata mokakdo keruwa...mu issarahata...thopi dennawa ekata aandala hadanawa mama thopen kulu mi harak patiyek....
